question: The Indian cricket team scored its lowest ever total in Test cricket against which team?
explanation:
The Indian cricket team has recently scored its lowest ever total in Test cricket against the Australian cricket team.
In the second innings of the first Test match, Indian team collapsed to 36 runs leaving 9 wickets in 21.2 overs. Indian Team had a 53-run lead in the first innings. India's earlier lowest score was 42 in the year 1974 against England.
